alert.note: Alert for Barry; Clinton; Eaton; Ingham; Ionia; Kent (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 7:22PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of Kent, Ingham, Ionia, Barry, Clinton and Eaton Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 720 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of developing thunderstorms extending from near Middleville to 6 miles south of Eaton Rapids. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds to around 40 mph and pea sized hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lansing... Ionia... Charlotte... Mason... St. Johns... Hastings... Eaton Rapids... Portland... Lowell... East Lansing... Grand Ledge... Williamston... Middleville... Potterville... Lake Odessa... Leslie... Nashville... Saranac... Freeport... Edgemont Park... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Occasional cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Barry; Clinton; Eaton; Ingham; Ionia; Kent
